wiki.summary: “Open Hearts” is a promotional single from The Weeknd’s sixth studio album, Hurry Up Tomorrow. It also marks the second collaboration between Apple and The Weeknd with its Anton Tammi-directed “immersive experience”, marketed as an exclusive for the Apple Vision Pro. “Open Hearts” explores themes of healing from heartbreak and learning to love again, a theme not uncommon in Abel’s music. Abel uses the age old trope in music of having a savior pull him out of his misery and show him love. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Open Hearts” is a promotional single from The Weeknd’s sixth studio album, Hurry Up Tomorrow. It also marks the second collaboration between Apple and The Weeknd with its Anton Tammi-directed “immersive experience”, marketed as an exclusive for the Apple Vision Pro. “Open Hearts” explores themes of healing from heartbreak and learning to love again, a theme not uncommon in Abel’s music. Abel uses the age old trope in music of having a savior pull him out of his misery and show him love. The song’s existence, as well as its production credits, were first revealed on August 30, 2024 through being uploaded on the ASCAP database. It was also performed for the first time in Sydney’s first concert of the After Hours Til Dawn Tour on October 22, 2024 (being played a second time the following night). On November 11, 2024, Abel announced in his social medias the Open Hearts immersive music experience on Apple Vision Pro and in select Apple stores beginning November 15th. Read more on Last.fm.
